sentences.en: After a couple of brandies Michael started telling me his life story.
sentences.cn: 几杯白兰地酒过后,迈克尔开始向我讲述他的人生故事。

sentences.en: All sherry is made from wine fortified with brandy.
sentences.cn: 所有的雪利酒都是在葡萄酒中加入白兰地勾兑成的。
白兰地酒是用葡萄酿的.

sentences.en: Chris watched him sipping his brandy.
sentences.cn: 克里斯注视着他品尝白兰地。

sentences.en: Fuddled by brandy, her brain fumbled over the events of the night.
sentences.cn: 白兰地让她脑子昏昏沉沉的，记不清楚晚上发生的事了。

sentences.en: Go and get me a large brandy.
sentences.cn: 去给我拿一大杯白兰地来。

sentences.en: Have this brandy; it will pull you round.
sentences.cn: 把这白兰地喝了, 它会使你复元的.

sentences.en: He poured himself a brandy and swallowed it neat.
sentences.cn: 他给自己倒了一杯白兰地，没兑水就一饮而尽。

sentences.en: Her eyes lit on the brandy bottle that Atanas had dropped on the floor.
sentences.cn: 她的视线突然落到阿塔纳斯掉在地上的白兰地酒瓶上。

sentences.en: I had a very good 14.2 hands pony, called Brandy.
sentences.cn: 我有一匹很棒的14.2手高的小马，名叫布朗迪。

sentences.en: I took another drink of brandy and moved forward.
sentences.cn: 我又喝了一口白兰地,向前走去.

sentences.en: Pack the fruits and nuts into the jars and cover with brandy.
sentences.cn: 把水果和坚果放进罐子里，用白兰地酒浸泡。

sentences.en: She laced his brandy with coffee.
sentences.cn: 她在他的白兰地里加了一点咖啡.

sentences.en: The alcoholic strength of brandy far exceeds that of wine.
sentences.cn: 白兰地的酒精浓度远远超过葡萄酒.

sentences.en: The brandy made him choke, but it restored his nerve.
sentences.cn: 虽说白兰地呛了他一下，却让他恢复了勇气。

sentences.en: Unlike wine, brandy matures only in wood, not glass.
sentences.cn: 和葡萄酒不同的是，白兰地只能在木制容器而非玻璃容器里酿制。

trans.tran_en: a strong alcoholic drink made from wine, or a glass of this drink
